name: RapidFireMath
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rapid fire math
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Rapid Fire Math will help you sharpen your mind by making you do simple math calculations in your head. At start, you will be asked to rate yourself in a scale of 0 to 10. Based on your rating you will be asked math questions involving a combination of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of numbers. It is a good way of killing idle time and boost your brain at the same time. 

This skill offers an endless series of questions with varying complexity. Moreover, this skill is perfect for your kids as well. For this choose a rating below 5. If you choose a rating of zero then the skill will simply ask you to repeat a number which is great if your kid is learning to speak numbers. You can also use this mode to turn the skill into a number guessing game!

Choose a rating above 5 and you may have to deal with 3 numbers at a time. Also, hear the audience reaction as you answer the questions.

Once you're in the skill, you can use the following commands to help you navigate:
[0-10] - Rate yourself
Number - Answer the question
Help - Know about the skill
Stop - Stop the skill

Give feedback and let us now what more you would like to see in the skill. Try it out!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
